title: Moving or renaming a file causes rclone to give an error, but complete the task.
body:
<!--

Welcome :-) We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

If you've just got a question or aren't sure if you've found a bug then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

instead of filing an issue for a quick response.

If you think you might have found a bug, please can you try to replicate it with the latest beta?

    https://beta.rclone.org/
    
If you can still replicate it with the latest beta, then please fill in the info below which makes our lives much easier.  A log with -vv will make our day :-)

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

Jottacloud remote causes the system to give an error when moving or renaming any file within the remote, but completes the task.

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)
rclone v1.52.0-008-g8774381e-beta (latest beta) and rclone v1.51.0



#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)
Windows 10 64bit and Android arm.


####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)
Jottacloud


#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
Moving and renaming a file through a file manager on a mounted drive.


#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```
2020/05/31 18:45:30 ERROR : Documents/americanphone/New Text Documentb.txt: Couldn't move: couldn't move file: error 404: no.jotta.backup.errors.NoSuchFileException: Source file /5d2cd552a044b7013334fc06/Jotta/Archive/Documents/americanphone/New Text Documentb.txt does not exist (Not Found)
2020/05/31 18:45:30 ERROR : Documents/americanphone/New Text Documenta.txt: File.Rename error: couldn't move file: error 404: no.jotta.backup.errors.NoSuchFileException: Source file /5d2cd552a044b7013334fc06/Jotta/Archive/Documents/americanphone/New Text Documentb.txt does not exist (Not Found)
2020/05/31 18:45:30 ERROR : Documents/americanphone/New Text Documentb.txt: Dir.Rename error: couldn't move file: error 404: no.jotta.backup.errors.NoSuchFileException: Source file /5d2cd552a044b7013334fc06/Jotta/Archive/Documents/americanphone/New Text Documentb.txt does not exist (Not Found)
2020/05/31 18:45:30 ERROR : IO error: couldn't move file: error 404: no.jotta.backup.errors.NoSuchFileException: Source file /5d2cd552a044b7013334fc06/Jotta/Archive/Documents/americanphone/New Text Documentb.txt does not exist (Not Found)
2020/05/31 18:45:49 ERROR : Documents/americanphone/New Text Documenta.txt: Couldn't move: couldn't move file: error 404: no.jotta.backup.errors.NoSuchFileException: Source file /5d2cd552a044b7013334fc06/Jotta/Archive/Documents/americanphone/New Text Documenta.txt does not exist (Not Found)
2020/05/31 18:45:49 ERROR : Documents/New Text Documenta.txt: File.Rename error: couldn't move file: error 404: no.jotta.backup.errors.NoSuchFileException: Source file /5d2cd552a044b7013334fc06/Jotta/Archive/Documents/americanphone/New Text Documenta.txt does not exist (Not Found)
2020/05/31 18:45:49 ERROR : Documents/americanphone/New Text Documenta.txt: Dir.Rename error: couldn't move file: error 404: no.jotta.backup.errors.NoSuchFileException: Source file /5d2cd552a044b7013334fc06/Jotta/Archive/Documents/americanphone/New Text Documenta.txt does not exist (Not Found)
2020/05/31 18:45:49 ERROR : IO error: couldn't move file: error 404: no.jotta.backup.errors.NoSuchFileException: Source file /5d2cd552a044b7013334fc06/Jotta/Archive/Documents/americanphone/New Text Documenta.txt does not exist (Not Found)
```
-vv log was too long. I first renamed the file from "New Text Documentb.txt" to "New Text Documenta.txt", then moved the file from the americanphone folder to the Documents folder.
